sense.def:
To connect one thing to another
pomeni združiti eno stvar z drugo.

seg.quote: Connect the fishing line to the hook.
The rooms had connecting doors between them.

sense.def:
Če je naprava
connected
, je z žico povezana z električno vtičnico ali kakšno drugo napravo.

seg.quote: ...a telephone line connected to their terminal.

sense.def:
Kadar telefonski operater
connects someone
, nekomu omogoči telefonski pogovor z drugo osebo.

seg.quote: I'm trying to connect you, sir.

sense.def:
Kadar vlak, letalo ali avtobus
connects with another form of transport
, prispe ob takem času, da potniki lahko prestopijo na drugo prevozno sredstvo in nadaljujejo pot.

To connect a person or thing with something
pomeni ugotoviti, da je med dvema osebama ali stvarema zveza.

seg.quote: There is no evidence to connect Griffiths with the murder.
